[program:lino_runworker_{{project_name}}]
environment=
    DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE={{settings_module}}
directory={{project_path}}
command=/bin/bash -c "source {{env_activate}} && python manage.py runworker {{channels}}"
stopsignal=KILL
killasgroup=true
priority=998
startsecs=5

[program:initiate_linod_{{project_name}}]
environment=
    DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE={{settings_module}}
directory={{project_path}}
command=/bin/bash -c "source {{env_activate}} && python manage.py initiate_linod"
autorestart=false
priority=999
